actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To prohibit the transportation, treatment, storage, or disposal of hazardous waste outside the State in which the waste was generated.

summary.text: Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to prohibit, after 1993, the transport, treatment, storage, or disposal of hazardous waste outside the State in which such waste was generated.

titles.title: To prohibit the transportation, treatment, storage, or disposal of hazardous waste outside the State in which the waste was generated.
